code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{Table,TableBody,TableCell,TableContainer,TableHead,TableRow,Paper}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ListaProveedores=()=>{const[datosProveedores,setDatosProveedores]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('http://127.0.0.1:5000/Proveedores').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setDatosProveedores(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching data:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableContainer,{component:Paper,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableHead,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableRow,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Raz\xF3n Social"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Nombre Comercial"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Acciones"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableBody,{children:datosProveedores.map(supplier=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableRow,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:supplier.razonSocial}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:supplier.nombreComercial}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/edit/".concat(supplier.id),children:"Editar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/screening/".concat(supplier.id),children:"Screening"})]})})]},supplier.id))})]})});};export default ListaProveedores;
